scripts.build-browser: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-browser
scripts.build-ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios && vue-cli-service cordova-build-ios --device --release
scripts.build-www-android: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-android
scripts.build-www-browser: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-browser
scripts.build-www-ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-ios
scripts.cordova-build-android: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-build-android
scripts.cordova-build-browser: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-browser
scripts.cordova-build-electron: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron vue-cli-service cordova-build-electron
scripts.cordova-build-ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-build-ios
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-android: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-android
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-browser: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-browser
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-electron: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-electron
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-ios
scripts.cordova-build-only-www-osx: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-build-only-www-osx
scripts.cordova-build-osx: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-build-osx
scripts.cordova-serve-android: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service cordova-serve-android
scripts.cordova-serve-browser: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=browser vue-cli-service cordova-serve-browser
scripts.cordova-serve-electron: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=electron vue-cli-service cordova-serve-electron
scripts.cordova-serve-ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-serve-ios
scripts.cordova-serve-osx: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=osx vue-cli-service cordova-serve-osx
scripts.deploy-android: yarn lint && cd src-cordova && fastlane supply --apk app-release.apk --track alpha --release_status draft --package_name network.gram.navigator
scripts.deploy-ios: yarn lint && cd src-cordova && fastlane ios build
scripts.docker-build: yarn lint && docker image build -t dev .
scripts.ios: yarn lint && cross-env CORDOVA_PLATFORM=ios vue-cli-service cordova-serve-ios
scripts.cy: yarn lint && $(npm bin)/cypress open --browser chrome --config watchForFileChanges=true
scripts.wasm-link: cd ../wasm && yarn link && cd ../navigator && yarn link @gram-net/wasm
